Confidence Booster.name: Confidence Booster
Confidence Booster.desc: Reduces incoming damage by 10% and Stagger by 1. Lasts 20s.

Ambit Ember.name: Ambit Ember
Ambit Ember.desc: Slightly increases Evade Window and Evade Speed by 15%. Lasts 60s.

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.desc: Removes CORRODED effect and increases ACID resistance by 15%. Lasts 10m.

Ethereal Orb.name: Ethereal Orb
Ethereal Orb.desc: Removes OVERLOADED effect and increases SHOCK resistance by 15%. Lasts 10m.

Faerie Needle.name: Faerie Needle
Faerie Needle.desc: Increases Mod Power Regen by 10 MP per second. Lasts 30s.

Mud Rub.name: Mud Rub
Mud Rub.desc: Extinguishes BURNING effect and increases FIRE resistance by 15. Lasts 10m.

Mystery Jerky.name: Mystery Jerky
Mystery Jerky.desc: Converts 1 Health into Grey Health per second. Lasts 30s.

Oilskin Balm.name: Oilskin Balm
Oilskin Balm.desc: Cures ROOT ROT Blight and increases Blight Resistance by 25%. Lasts 10m.

Processed Koara.name: Processed Koara
Processed Koara.desc: Decreases Stamina Recovery delay by 75% and Stamina Regen Penalty by 50%. Lasts 60s.

Purified Salve.name: Purified Salve
Purified Salve.desc: Cures CURSE and increases Blight Resistance by 25%. Lasts 10m.

Rocket Fuel.name: Rocket Fuel
Rocket Fuel.desc: Increases Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Attack Speed by 15%. Lasts 20s.

Timeworn Unguent.name: Timeworn Unguent
Timeworn Unguent.desc: Cures SUPPRESSION Blight and increases Blight Resistance by 25%. Lasts 10m.
